original_text: Gadi's son Menahem became the king of Israel when Azariah had been king of Judah for 39 years. He ruled as king in Samaria for ten years.
korean_text: 유다 왕 아사랴 제삼십구년에 가디의 아들 므나헴이 이스라엘 왕이 되어 사마리아에서 십 년간 다스리며

sentences.original_text: Gadi's son Menahem became the king of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 가디의 아들 므나헴이 이스라엘의 왕이 되었고

sentences.original_text: when Azariah had been king of Judah for 39 years
sentences.korean_translation: 아사랴가 유다 왕이 된 지 39년이었을 때

sentences.original_text: He ruled as king in Samaria
